依托

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

你们有点过激了，我只想说一件事，倘若有一天原神真的消失，你们会高兴开心吗？对我来说，原神不仅仅是一款游戏，我玩的时间不是很长，毕竟不是开服玩家，只玩了一年的时间。这游戏就像是，在我不太完美的人生中，照来了一束光，我并不想让这束光消失，因为它如今已经渐渐的成为我坚持活下去的理由之一。我现在之所以活着，一是因为我也害怕消失，二就是我的父母家人 ，三是我相信这个世界并没有那么糟糕。所以我努力的成为，我父亲母亲想成为的人 ，我想让他们幸福快乐的度过余生，但有时候面具带久了，就好像变的是真的一样，这样子很累，很累，真的很累，我和我的父母解释讲道理，我知道这是没用的，但我真的希望父母能认真的听一下我的话。而原神这个游戏，至少在让我进入这个游戏的时候，我可以稍微的放轻松一下，稍微的休息一下。有时候我也会难过，毕竟我是人，我是有感情的，我不是机器。也许我也是疯了，我竟然和你们说了这么多，管他呢，如果你们想骂，就在下面骂吧，所以说反原神吧的各位，你们是发自内心的想让原神消失吗？只要他一天不消失，你们就内心不痛快，就内心不舒服，想要发泄吗？但是如果真的消失了，你们到底会不会开心？能说下吗？

Overwatch 2 is an amazing game for the first 50 hours, but the moment you understand what you are doing and how the game works, it's just a horrible game.

The match maker will waste your time, you will get banned if enough people falsely report you, and the only end game I could find in the game is swiping your credit card for cash shop items.
Just play a few games in competitive and you will understand why Overwatch is a horrible game. There is not one game I know that comes even close to the Overwatch toxicity. If you can say something over voice chat, I most likely heard it.

But the absolute worst part of Overwatch is the forced match making. You will lose around 50 % of your matches, no matter what you do. I'm not even talking about match manipulation by smurfs. And that's another huge problem: Smurfs, people who don't belong in the elo, but monetize their gameplay through streaming platforms and show how they own noobs.
The real problem of Overwatch is the match maker and the rigged calculates your elo. It's all about winning and that's it. You played like a top1 god as support in Bronze, but two top10 dpssmurfs are on the enemy team as dps? The match maker treats you as if you were afk without looking at your gameplay. Combine this with forced losses, where your team is much worse than the enemy team, and you have the "competitive" experience.
Not everyone is a commercial game streamer. NO ONE with a real job can spend hundreds of hours of their life to climb. Every loss in competitive requires at least 2 wins, so you can actually climb. A game take around 20 minutes, this means if you lose one game, you lost 1 hours of your life because you need now two additional games to nullify the loss. And if you win and lose around 50 %, it can take hundreds of hours to climb to your real rank, depending on how rigged your matches are.

There are of course a lot more problems like pretty much no content (only a few maps and heroes that get old pretty fast) and so much other stuff like the horrible slow design of the "Battlepas" and the overall addictive nature of the game that tries to not only waste your time, but manipulates you with the Barbie and Ken artstyle.

Overwatch is not a game for children. It's a ice cold commercial business game that is all about you swiping your credit card and manipulating you with the "cute look" and the "community" to play the game more than you should, while also giving you so little rewards, that you are forced to swipe your credit card if you want to experience some kind of improvement like skins.

暴雪是站着喝酒而穿长衫的唯一的人。他身材很瘦小；蓝黑脸色，皱纹间时常夹些伤痕；一部无人问津的暗黑4。穿的虽然是长衫，可是又脏又破，似乎七年没有补，也没有洗。他对人说话，总是满口之乎者也，叫人半懂不懂的。因为他姓暴，别人便从描红纸上的“下小人blizzard”这半懂不懂的话里，替他取下一个绰号，叫作暴雪。暴雪一到店，所有喝酒的人便都看着他笑，有的叫道，“暴雪，你怎么上steam了！”他不回答，对柜里说，“温两碗酒，要一碟韭菜。”便排出九文大钱。他们又故意的高声嚷道，“你一定又欠了人家的钱了！”暴雪睁大眼睛说，“你怎么这样凭空污人清白……”“什么清白？我前天亲眼见你欠了网易的钱，吊着打。”暴雪便涨红了脸，额上的青筋条条绽出，争辩道，“国服关停不能算欠……关服！……游戏人的事，能算欠么？”接连便是难懂的话，什么“考迪克”，什么“代理”之类，引得众人都哄笑起来：店内外充满了快活的空气。
简单来说，就是不好玩，无论是模式还是平衡，都不如1好玩

Overwatch 2 CAN be fun, it's just got one of the worst communities for a game EVER, some of the most anti-consumer practices for a game EVER, and it's also more and more frustrating when you play more and more. This game can really be fun if you have a friend or two, play it casually (or just not care about it like your life depends on it), try to ignore basically anything negative anyone says (so 90% of text chat) and take very frequent breaks, and then this game is fun!! You have to do so much to even maintain a fun time, the base game itself IS fun, everything else around it though drives that fun to the absolute ground. Just.. don't. Play TF2 or genuinely any other game or something, you'll have a better time.

- 오버워치 2의 장점 -

영구 무료화, 엔진 업그레이드, 신규 영웅, 신규 전장, 신규 스킨, 신규 컨텐츠, 5 VS 5, 영웅 일부 리메이크, 임무 미션 추가



- 오버워치 2의 단점 -

앞서 말한 장점들은 굳이 2편 아니었어도 1편으로 충분히 할 수 있었음

스킨 구매 : 전리품 삭제 + 현질 시스템으로 변경
스킨 가격 : K-물가급

고작 이것들 준비한다고 1편 '없'데이트 기간 : 2년 이상

굳이 2편 아니었어도 1편으로 다 엎을 수 있던 것들인데 괜히 옵치2로 엔진 바꿔서 지랄하겠다고 선언한 뒤 민심 안 좋을까봐 준비하던 거, 동시에 그나마 1편에서는 못보고 2편에서 크게 보여줄 수 있던거 : 바로 PVE 모드

그러나 PVE 모드는 1년 반 전에 개발 중단 그리고 그걸 이제 말함, 물론 아예 취소 된 건 아니고, 전작의 4인 협동 플레이 처럼 한다 하지만 이게 웬 걸? 여전히 정신 못 차렸나, 이걸 유료로 쳐 팔아 먹고 앉아 있네 ㅋㅋㅋ

PVE 모드 취소 이유 : 우린 아직도 LGBTQ 뇌절에 맛 들렸는데, 그게 소홀해질까봐 PVE 아몰랑 귀차나 시전함 ㅅㄱ

The developers left Overwatch with no updates for 3 years, saying they were working on Overwatch 2 which will be focusing on PvE content. Now, Overwatch 2 came out and what do we have here? Let's see:

Game content wise there are hardly any changes. They changed the main format from 6v6 to 5v5 while also making some heroes just clearly worse (thinking of Mei for example) and the PvE content was nowhere to be found, which was the whole point of the second game.

They removed the lootboxes and free ways to earn cosmetics and instead they introduced a battle pass system with very limited unlockables for F2P players, and making it so that all new heroes are locked behind said battle pass progress, which you were almost forced to grind because of the fear of missing out, since at the beginning they gave you no free alternative to buy heroes.

And finally getting to their core focus of Overwatch 2, the PvE was abandoned, and they are only giving a highly monetized, butchered version of their promise.

The gameplay itself is fine, but Blizzard is not, it's nowhere near of what it used to be back in the good old days. Don't let them exploit you, and play another game which has much more care and respect for their playerbase.
